Basketball superstar Shaquille O'Neal headlines this kid-oriented comic book action-adventure(n)

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: A very loose remake of the classic multi-star comedy It's a Mad Mad Mad Mad World (1963), this madcap comedy is directed by Jerry Zucker, one third of the Zucker-Abrahams-Zucker comedy team and director of Ghost (1990). John Cleese stars as an eccentric casino owner who devises a contest pitting six teams against each other in a race to claim two million dollars from a locker in New Mexico. The competitors are Owen (Cuba Gooding Jr., who ends up driving a bus full of Lucille Ball imitators, a foreigner (Rowan Atkinson) who hitches a ride in an organ donor vehicle, and a recently reunited mother and daughter (Whoopi Goldberg and Lanei Chapman) who anger a "squirrel lady" (Kathy Bates) -- much to their regret. There are also two con artist brothers (Seth Green and Vince Vieluf), the upright Nick (Breckin Meyer), who gets a lift from cute but psychotic pilot Tracy (Amy Smart), and the eccentric Pear family, headed up by Jon Lovitz. Rat Race also stars Dave Thomas, Kathy Najimy, Wayne Knight, Dean Cain, and Paul Rodriguez(n)

programme.title: Catch Me if You Can
programme.desc: A true story about Frank Abagnale Jr., who, before his 19th birthday, fraudulently obtained millions of dollars in cheques while posing as a Pan Am pilot, doctor, and legal prosecutor(n)

programme.title: The Fight Game With Jim Lampley
programme.desc: 06/14/2017. An interview with Sergey Kovalev; a breakdown of the Andre Ward-Kovalev rematch; a recap of Terence Crawford's New York fight; and a look back at the David Tua vs. Ike Ibeabuchi 1997 heavyweight bout(n)

programme.title: Just Married
programme.desc: Loved-up newlyweds, Sarah and Tom, experience the honeymoon from hell when her disapproving family dispatch Sarah's ex-boyfriend to undo the marital knot(n)

programme.title: The Trans List
programme.desc: Notable transgender individuals, including Caitlyn Jenner, Caroline Cossey, Buck Angel, and Laverne Cox, are interviewed. They candidly discuss their experiences and what it means to be transgender. One in a series of grouped interview documentaries by director Timothy Greenfield-Sanders(n)

programme.title: August Rush
programme.desc: An orphaned musical prodigy uses his gift to help him his birth parents(n)

programme.title: Get Smart
programme.desc: Steve Carell is Maxwell Smart, a covert agent who often finds himself out of his depths but never out of options. It's CONTROL veruss KAOS all over again as this action comedy based on a beloved hit TV series from the sixties pits Agent 86 against a nuclear scheme by the evil spy conglomerate. Partnered with sexy and capable Agent 99 (Anne Hathaway), he navigates the world of multifunction pocketknives and exploding dental floss to hilarious effect. The all-star cast is rounded up by Dwayne Johnson, Terence Stamp, Alan Arkin and James Caan(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Years after leaving the jungle and settling down with his wife Jane in London, Tarzan returns to the Congo to act as a trade representative for England. However, he soon clashes with a greedy Belgian captain who has sinister plans for his old home(n)

programme.title: Vice News Tonight
programme.desc: Episode 157. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Rush Hour 3
programme.desc: Brett Ratner's martial-arts action-comedy sequel starring Chris Tucker and Jackie Chan. When the Chinese Ambassador to the US is shot while in the act of divulging the whereabouts of a major Triad leader, the American authorities once more send Chief Inspector Lee and Detective James Carter into the fray. Lee quickly corners the would-be assassin, Kenji, but the shock of coming face-to-face with an old friend gives the baddie just enough time to escape. Kenji's trail leads the mismatched cops to Paris, where car chases and a sequence among the under-dressed dancers of the Folies Bergère await them, plus rather a lot of dodgy French stereotypes and a finale atop the Eiffel Tower(n)

programme.desc: Payne is the taunting psycho threatening LA with high explosives, Jack the agent who's close to catching him. When Payne loads a bus with bombs, Jack must evacuate the passengers while keeping the vehicle travelling at over 50mph(n)

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Ultracool thriller crammed with guns and girls, with Samuel L Jackson as cop John Shaft going outside the law to hunt down white collar murderer Christian Bale(n)

programme.title: T.J. Miller Meticulously Ridiculous
programme.desc: Comedian T.J. Miller performs in Denver at the Paramount Theatre. Topics include nightmares; the differences between alcohol and marijuana; his favorite figure from history; and the challenges of talking about death(n)

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.sub-title: Maajid Nawaz; Richard Painter; Bianna Golodryga; Charlie Sykes; Bradley Whitford
programme.desc: Maajid Nawaz; Richard Painter; Bianna Golodryga; Charlie Sykes; Bradley Whitford. Counter-extremism expert Maajid Nawaz and attorney Richard Painter are the interview guests. The panelists are journalist Bianna Golodryga, political commentator Charlie Sykes and actor Bradley Whitford(n)

programme.title: Harold & Kumar Escape From Guantanamo Bay
programme.desc: Kal Penn and John Cho return in this outrageous and unrated sequel. The pot-smoking slacker pals are suspected of being terrorists---and have more irreverent misadventures with Neil Patrick Harris. Rob Corddry, Roger Bart, David Krumholtz, Eddie Kaye Thomas. Written and directed by Jon Hurwitz and Hayden Schlossberg(n)

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Caped Crusader, Gotham City's superhero, battles the Joker in Tim Burton's blockbuster(n)

programme.title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel
programme.desc: 06/20/2017. Segments include a look at the dwindling popularity of bullfighting in Spain; profiles of American tennis up-and-comer Frances Tiafoe and Paralympian and Mount Everest climber Jeff Glasbrenner; a visit with a young man working to chronicle and assist surviving Negro League players(n)

programme.title: Rails & Ties
programme.desc: Suffering from addiction and depression, Laura Danner (Bonnie Root) drives her car--with her son, Davey (Miles Heizer), inside--onto the railroad tracks, waiting for the train to come and kill them. Davey is able to get out but not save his mother as the train, driven by engineer Tom Stark (Kevin Bacon), crashes into the car(n)

programme.title: Mariela Castro's March: Cuba's LGBT Revolution
programme.desc: A profile of Mariela Castro, a daughter of Cuban president Raúl Castro and a member of the National Assembly who is an influential advocate for the nation's LGBT community(n)

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: A bride-to-be attempts to learn the true identity of her father - with a little help from the music of ABBA. Musical(n)

programme.title: Batman & Robin
programme.desc: Action fantasy in which the Caped Crusader returns to face a dangerous coalition of arch-enemies intent on his destruction. Aided and abetted by Robin and Batgirl, Batman must confront Mr Freeze, a cold-hearted villain who has teamed up with the deadly Poison Ivy, and foil their plan to conquer the world(n)

programme.title: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
programme.desc: Deloris Van Cartier is back in front of the big band, but not for long. The Vegas singer hears that the school is set to close and organises a choir to save it(n)

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: A CIA assassin asks a former high-school classmate, now an accountant, for his help in saving the world(n)

programme.title: Vice News Tonight
programme.desc: Episode 158. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel
programme.desc: 06/20/2017. Segments include a look at the dwindling popularity of bullfighting in Spain; profiles of American tennis up-and-comer Frances Tiafoe and Paralympian and Mount Everest climber Jeff Glasbrenner; a visit with a young man working to chronicle and assist surviving Negro League players(n)

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: Groundbreaking. In the Season 6 finale, Selina and her staff get ready for the long-awaited groundbreaking for her library; Amy seeks clarity on her role; and Jonah asks Dan, Ben and Kent for help(n)

programme.title: The Birth of a Nation
programme.desc: This historical drama recounts a real-life slave revolt that occurred in 1831 Virginia, led by a black preacher named Nat Turner. Turner is so appalled by the horrors he sees while sermonising that he is moved to fight back(n)

programme.title: End of Days
programme.desc: 1999 proved a banner year for screen portrayals of Satan's love life: first his relationship with Saddam Hussein went under the microscope in South Park: Bigger, Longer and Uncut, and a few months later his search for a girl to settle down with became the basis of this thriller. With the millennium approaching, a series of disturbing signs suggests that Satan (here played by Gabriel Byrne) has returned to Earth and is walking the streets of New York City. It seems that Satan needs to find a woman who will bear his child, as the time for the arrival of the anti-Christ draws near. A woman named Christine (Robin Tunney) believes that she has seen the Devil and felt his presence, and it's up to Jericho Cane (Arnold Schwarzenegger), a former policeman turned elite bodyguard, to keep her safe from The Dark Lord. End of Days was both directed and photographed by Peter Hyams; Kevin Pollak, Renee Olstead, and Udo Kier are among the supporting cast(n)

programme.title: Screwed
programme.desc: Scott Alexander and Larry Karaszewski, who scripted "Ed Wood" and "Man on the Moon," co-directed and co-wrote this frenetic farce about a chauffeur (Norm Macdonald) who steers into big trouble when he kidnaps the pooch of his wealthy, tyrannical boss (Elaine Stritch). Danny DeVito, Dave Chappelle, Daniel Benzali, Sherman Hemsley, Sarah Silverman, Malcolm Stewart(n)

programme.title: Meet the Donors: Does Money Talk?
programme.desc: Alexandra Pelosi looks at money in politics and interviews wealthy donors to Republican and Democratic parties to ask them about their contributions and philosophies. Also: a look at efforts to enact campaign-finance reform(n)

programme.title: Lady in the Water
programme.desc: In this mesmerizing horror fantasy, an apartment manager finds a sea nymph called a "narf" in the complex's swimming pool, and tries to return her to her natural habitat. However, otherworldly monsters are out to stop him(n)

programme.title: The Wizard of Lies
programme.desc: Adaptation of journalist Diana B. Henriques' account of financier Bernie Madoff's orchestration of one of the largest frauds in U.S. history that led to financial ruin for thousands of investors and, in the process, his own family's destruction(n)

programme.title: Resident Evil
programme.desc: Alice leads a team of commandos into the multi-national Umbrella Corporation's locked-down bunker, which is controlled by the main computer, The Red Queen. The unit is sealed because of a virus that gassed all the staff but, as Alice and her team discover, the virus has re-animated them. Now, as well as facing the computer's weaponry, they must tackle the living dead to prevent the virus escaping into the outside world. Paul W Anderson's horror thriller is based on the successful computer game(n)

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Now fully recovered from his amnesia, former CIA assassin Jason Bourne attempts to uncover the truth behind his father's death, while simultaneously exacting revenge and evading the government forces hot on his trail(n)

programme.title: Scream 2
programme.desc: Programme details are currently unavailable(n)

programme.title: Unbreakable
programme.desc: Haunting comic book story of a train crash survivor who realises that he has never been hurt and befriends his opposite, a man who has never been free from injury(n)

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: Groundbreaking. In the Season 6 finale, Selina and her staff get ready for the long-awaited groundbreaking for her library; Amy seeks clarity on her role; and Jonah asks Dan, Ben and Kent for help(n)

programme.title: Silicon Valley
programme.desc: Server Error. In the Series 4 finale, Richard's caught in a web of lies in a last-ditch attempt to save Pied Piper. Meanwhile, Jared plans his exit when he's worried about Richard's future; Jack tries to change the narrative; and Gavin plots his comeback(n)

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Now fully recovered from his amnesia, former CIA assassin Jason Bourne attempts to uncover the truth behind his father's death, while simultaneously exacting revenge and evading the government forces hot on his trail(n)

programme.title: The Wizard of Lies
programme.desc: Adaptation of journalist Diana B. Henriques' account of financier Bernie Madoff's orchestration of one of the largest frauds in U.S. history that led to financial ruin for thousands of investors and, in the process, his own family's destruction(n)

programme.title: Making of 'All Eyez on Me'
programme.desc: A look at "All Eyez on Me," a 2017 biopic of legendary rapper Tupac Shakur that chronicles his rise to fame and untimely death at the age of 25. The film stars Demetrius Shipp Jr., Danai Gurira and Lauren Cohan, and is directed by Benny Boom(n)

programme.title: The Cell
programme.desc: Using a pioneering technique, a psychologist enters the mind of a comatose serial killer to try to locate his most recent victim(n)

programme.title: American Psycho
programme.desc: Graphic violence and dark comedy color this adaptation of Bret Easton Ellis's controversial novel. A hotshot broker (Christian Bale) basks in the excesses of his late-1980s yuppie lifestyle, but behind his slick appearance lurks a soulless killer who's cutting a murderous swath through New York City. Contains footage not shown in theaters. Jared Leto, Willem Dafoe, Chloe Sevigny, Reese Witherspoon(n)

programme.title: 3 1/2 Minutes, Ten Bullets
programme.desc: A stunning documentary look at the 2012 murder of unarmed black teenager Jordan Davis at a Florida gas station, and the political and social fervor that surrounded the ensuing criminal case. On trial for the murder is white middle-aged Michael Dunn, who shot Davis after taking issue with the loud rap music coming from the car Davis occupied with his friends. Florida's controversial "Stand Your Ground" law is examined in full in this emotional documentary, which has been picked up for distribution by HBO(n)

programme.title: Storks
programme.desc: A stork and his human pal must team up to transport a baby girl to her expectant family, even though storks have long since gotten out of the baby delivery business ever since they started working as couriers for an internet merchant(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Mummy'
programme.desc: A look at "The Mummy," a 2017 horror film about a cruel princess of ancient Egypt who wreaks havoc on humanity after she is accidentally resurrected. The film stars Tom Cruise, Sofia Boutella and Annabelle Wallis, and is directed by Alex Kurtzman(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life of Bees
programme.desc: Drama starring Queen Latifah and Dakota Fanning, set in South Carolina during the turbulent struggle for civil rights in the early 60s. Fourteen-year-old Lily Owens is seeking to escape the clutches of her abusive father and find some relief from the haunting memories of her mother's death. In her attempt to find peace, she flees to the comforting, supportive, empowering environment created by August Boatwright and her sisters, May, and June. There, she finds a sense of purpose in looking after the sisters' bees, romance with local boy Zach and a fuller understanding of her mother's past(n)

programme.title: Rain Man
programme.desc: When Charlie Babbitt's father leaves his cash to the autistic brother Charlie never knew he had, the Babbitt boys embark on a road trip of discovery and card-counting(n)

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: A buttoned-down career woman agrees to let a loopy working-class girl become the surrogate mother of her child(n)

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc: Brilliant comedy, with Marisa Tomei winning an Oscar for Best Supporting Actress, as two innocent New Yorkers are put on trial for murder in a small town and it is up to their brash Italian American cousin to save them(n)

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: Vaccines. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: The Village
programme.desc: The people of Covington, a small town in rural Pennsylvania lead peaceful lives, only rarely disturbed by the creatures that inhabit the woods surrounding the village. An agreement has been reached with the creatures and peace prevails under the condition that the boundaries are respected. Yet this balance is disrupted when Lucius Hunt (Joaquin Phoenix), an inquisitive and willful young man, ventures himself beyond the limits of the village. After this, things will never be the same. Written and directed by M. Night Shyamalan, this is his third film after the huge success of The Sixth Sense(n)

programme.desc: Cyber Supremacy & Japan Rising. Ben Ferguson travels to Tel Aviv to see how Israel is leading the way on cybersecurity; Gianna Toboni reports on a right-wing movement in Japan to revive and strengthen its military might(n)

programme.desc: Planet Earth must band together again to fight off an alien invasion, 20 years after the first attack nearly devastated the globe(n)

programme.desc: Young parents Mac and Kelly find that their neighbour troubles are far from over when a hedonistic sorority moves in next door just as they're about to sell their house(n)

programme.desc: Michelle Darnell is a successful businesswoman who is sent to prison after being convicted of insider trading. She tries to start over after being released, but not everyone is ready to forgive and forget(n)

programme.title: Introducing the Dwights
programme.desc: Off-kilter coming-of-age comedy about an overbearing matriarch who sees her son's new girlfriend as a threat to their not-so-perfect family life(n)

programme.title: Looking: The Movie
programme.desc: Patrick returns to San Francisco after spending nearly a year in Denver, but while he's in town for a wedding, he also must confront some unresolved relationships he left in his rearview mirror(n)

programme.title: Three O'Clock High
programme.desc: The first feature film from director Phil Joanou (State of Grace), Three O' Clock High chronicles a high school nerd's much hyped after-school bout with the infamous class bully. When the impish Jerry Mitchell (Casey Siemaszko) is assigned to interview the new transfer student with a supposedly violent past, Buddy Revell (Richard Tyson), he makes the fatal mistake of touching his subject. Revell, who hates being touched, responds by challenging the unwilling Mitchell to a fight at three o'clock in the parking lot. Spanning the course of the school day, the film follows the disaster-bound Mitchell as he soils his good-boy image through various misguided attempts at averting the fight. Also making noteworthy appearances in the film are Jeffrey Tambor and Philip Baker Hall(n)

programme.title: Evil Dead II
programme.desc: Special effects and humour blend in a sequel about teenagers trapped in a haunted cabin(n)

programme.title: King Ralph
programme.desc: Social comedy in which a slobbish Las Vegas lounge singer is discovered to be the heir to the British throne when the entire royal family is wiped out in a freak accident. After crossing the Atlantic to ascend the throne, King Ralph finds himself taking lessons in etiquette from an exceedingly strait-laced courtier(n)

programme.title: Hail, Caesar!
programme.desc: This outlandish comedy set in the golden age of showbiz centers on a slick Hollywood fixer named Eddie Mannix, who is pressed into action when a superstar actor is kidnapped and held for ransom. Mannix must race to quietly collect the ransom money before the gossip mags catch wind of the scandal(n)

programme.title: Ferrell Takes the Field
programme.desc: Will Ferrell plays baseball in five spring training games for 10 different teams on one day in March 2015 as a fund-raiser for cancer research, and to honor former major leaguer Bert Campaneris, who played every position in a game in 1965 for the Kansas City A's(n)

programme.title: Innerspace
programme.desc: A test pilot is miniaturised and accidentally injected into a neurotic supermarket clerk(n)

programme.title: Fool's Gold
programme.desc: Ben Finn Finnegan is a treasure hunter who has made it his mission in life to track down the Queen's Dowry -- a legendary collection of 40 chests filled with priceless treasure, and lost at sea in 1715. But in his single-minded quest to track down this sizable booty, Finn has sadly neglected his marriage to his loving wife Tess. Tess has grown tired of the hunt, and now she's looking to start her life anew by going to work on the massive yacht of globetrotting billionaire Nigel Honeycutt(n)

programme.title: Blues Brothers 2000
programme.desc: Dan Aykroyd returns as Elwood Blues in this long-awaited sequel to the 1980 comedy. After 18 years in prison and death of his brother Jake, Elwood is on a new "Mission from God"--- to reunite the old band and give a troubled orphan a new lease on life. Joe Morton, J. Evan Bonifant, Nia Peeples, Kathleen Freeman, Frank Oz, Steve Lawrence, Erykah Badu, Darrell Hammond. Directed by John Landis(n)

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc: Brilliant comedy, with Marisa Tomei winning an Oscar for Best Supporting Actress, as two innocent New Yorkers are put on trial for murder in a small town and it is up to their brash Italian American cousin to save them(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Now You See Me 2'
programme.desc: A look at "Now You See Me 2," the 2016 sequel to the 2013 thriller that follows the Four Horsemen's return to perform a spectacular stunt in the hopes of clearing their name and exposing the unscrupulous behavior of a tech mogul. The film stars Jesse Eisenberg, Mark Ruffalo and Woody Harrelson, and is directed by Jon M. Chu(n)

programme.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
programme.desc: Drowning his sorrows in Hawaii after a break-up, Peter bumps into the one girl he didn't want to see. And she's on the arm of a notorious rock star(n)

programme.title: Fool's Gold
programme.desc: Ben Finn Finnegan is a treasure hunter who has made it his mission in life to track down the Queen's Dowry -- a legendary collection of 40 chests filled with priceless treasure, and lost at sea in 1715. Tess has grown tired of the hunt, and now she's looking to start her life anew by going to work on the massive yacht of globetrotting billionaire Nigel Honeycutt(n)

programme.title: Miami Rhapsody
programme.desc: Sarah Jessica Parker plays Gwyn, a copywriter whose extended family gradually reveals itself to be awash with adultery and self-delusion. Her father (PaulMazursky) and mother (Mia Farrow) are both playing away, he with a travel agent (Kelly Bishop), she with her own mother's Cuban nurse (Antonio Baneras). Her brother (Kevin Pollak) is playing around with his partner's model wife (Naomi Campbell) and her newly-married sister (Carla Gugino) has a farewell fling with an ex. The torrent of infidelity leads Gwyn to put her own wedding to Gil Bellows on hold. All is eventually put back together again, except for Gwyn herself(n)

programme.title: The Bonfire of the Vanities
programme.desc: Controversial adaptation of Tom Wolfe's acerbic novel. A successful Wall Street trader finds his charmed life turned into a shambles(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Now You See Me 2'
programme.desc: A look at "Now You See Me 2," the 2016 sequel to the 2013 thriller that follows the Four Horsemen's return to perform a spectacular stunt in the hopes of clearing their name and exposing the unscrupulous behavior of a tech mogul. programme.title: Bend It like Beckham
programme.desc: An independent-minded young woman discovers the joys of football, much to her family's chagrin, in this upbeat British comedy drama. Jess Bhamra (Parminder Nagra) is an 18-year-old growing up in West London, where her family has taken every effort to stay in touch with its Indian heritage. Jess' father and mother (Anupam Kher and Shaheen Khan) are after their daughter to go to law school, learn to cook a traditional Indian dinner, and settle down with a nice Indian boy -- the latter of which is high on the agenda of her older sister Pinky (Archie Panjabi), who is soon to wed her longtime beau Teetu (Kulvinder Ghir). However, her family is unaware that Jess has a secret passion -- football (or soccer, as it's known in North America). While Jess' enthusiasm for football star David Beckham is obvious, given the fact his photos cover the walls of her room, her parents don't know that in her spare time she likes to play a friendly game in the park with some of the boys in the neighborhood. One day, while Jess and her pals kick the ball around, she meets Jules (Keira Knightley), who is quite impressed with Jess' skills. Jules plays with a local semi-pro women's football team, the Hounslow Harriers, and she thinks Jess has what it takes to make the team. Jess knows that her parents would never approve of their daughter playing football, so she doesn't tell them, and starts spinning an increasingly complex series of lies as she tries to keep up a double life as a student and a footballer. Jess soon discovers a number of her new friends have their own problems to overcome; Jules dreams of playing pro ball in America, but has to deal with her stubborn and disapproving mother (Juliet Stevenson), while Joe (Jonathan Rhys Meyers), Hounslow's Irish coach, still struggles with the disappointment of a career as a professional athlete which was dashed by a knee injury. Bend It Like Beckham was a significant box-office success in Great Britain and Europe, but didn't reach American theaters until nearly a year after it debuted in the U.K(n)

programme.title: Mega Disasters
programme.desc: San Francisco Earthquake. By the dawn of the 20th century, San Francisco had evolved into one of the most booming metropolises in North America, with commerce, trade, manufacturing, arts and culture at meteoric levels. But an event that struck the city at 5:12am on April 18, 1906 wrought such cataclysmic devastation that it threatened to bring all of this toppling down. The San Francisco Earthquake checked in as one of the most severe quakes in the history of North America; at least 3,000 deaths occurred (with many unreported at the time), fires broke out, buildings crumbled, and the total devastation exceeded $6 billion in early 21st century dollars. As produced for the History Channel documentary series Mega Disasters, this program recounts that terrifying catastrophe, supplemented by vintage photographs of the disaster, and CG-animation speculating on similar crises that may lie ahead thanks to the instability of the Californian seismic faults(n)

programme.title: Shutter Island
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese and Leonardo DiCaprio team up for a fourth time for this adaptation of Shutter Island, a novel by Dennis Lehane (Mystic River). The film opens in 1954 as World War II veteran and current federal marshal Teddy Daniels (Leonardo DiCaprio) and his new partner, Chuck (Mark Ruffalo), ferry to Shutter Island, a water-bound mental hospital housing the criminally insane. They have been asked to investigate the disappearance of Rachel Solando (Emily Mortimer), a patient admitted to the asylum after she murdered her three children. As Teddy quizzes Dr. Cawley (Ben Kingsley), the head of the institution, he begins to suspect that the authorities in charge might not be giving him the whole truth, and that a terrible fate may befall all the patients in the spooky Ward C -- a unit devoted to the most heinous of the hospital's inmates. Complicating matters further, Teddy has a secret of his own -- the arsonist who murdered his wife is incarcerated on Shutter Island. Driven to confront his wife's killer, and stranded on the island because of a hurricane, Teddy must unravel the secrets of the eerie place before succumbing to his own madness. Max von Sydow, Emily Mortimer, Michelle Williams, Patricia Clarkson, and Jackie Earle Haley round out the supporting cast(n)

programme.title: Live 2017 FIFA Confederations Cup
programme.desc: Portugal v Chile (Kick-off 7.00pm). Mark Pougatch presents coverage of the opening semi-final from Kazan Arena in Russia. Both of these teams remain unbeaten in the tournament so far, with Portugal having topped Group A with a record of two wins and one draw, while one victory and two stalemates was enough for Chile to finish second in Group B behind Germany. Arsenal star Alexis Sanchez recently became the all-time leading scorer for Chile when he notched the opening goal in a 1-1 with the Germans on matchday two, and will be looking to create more headlines in this encounter and lead the South Americans to the final. With analysis from Lee Dixon and Jimmy Floyd Hasselbaink, and commentary by Clive Tyldesley and Glenn Hoddle. Subsequent programmes subject to change.(n)

programme.desc: Germany v Mexico (Kick-off 7.00pm). Mark Pougatch presents coverage of the second semi-final from Fisht Olympic Stadium in Sochi, Russia. programme.title: Killer Women with Piers Morgan
programme.desc: Piers travels to Homestead Correctional Institution in Florida to meet Amber Wright, who, at the age of 15 conspired with a group of friends to murder her ex-boyfriend Seath Jackson, an innocent teenage boy who was beaten, shot, and knee-capped before his corpse was burnt and his remains thrown in a quarry. Later, Piers travels to meet Seath's parents in Summerfield, Florida, with their visceral anger standing in stark contrast to Amber's cool demeanour. It soon emerges that Amber was a central player in the plot to kill Seath, but will she take responsibility for her actions?.(n)

The Chapmans' current outdoor space is unsuitable for the girls, with changes of levels, colours of plants and even the light through branches influencing their condition, so the crew follows the rules of a formal garden where straight lines, order and symmetry give an unfussy overall look.(n)

A woman and her two children bring their pet spaniel to the practice after it is hit by a car, and a 10-year-old collie with hip dysplasia visits the surgery.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The owners of the musically themed Harmony B&B in Torquay, Devon, begin the competition, trying to prove their establishment offers the best value for money. Dutch hosts Hans MacDaniel and Monica van der Meij try to impress their guests, but it remains to be seen what they will make of wheelchair badminton, saxophones at breakfast and a controversial sausage.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contest continues at Chimneys B&B in North Walsham, Norfolk, where owners Jenny and Richard Harmer's decision to use a flag as a tablecloth angers Hans MacDaniel and Monica Van Der Meij. The argument seems to abate during an afternoon canoeing session - only to resurface at breakfast the following day.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Beverley Conoley and Caroline Pocklington host at the Wordsworth Hotel in Cockermouth, Cumbria. They take their guests to a spa and Hans MacDaniel happily volunteers for a spray tan, while Richard Harmer is far more uncomfortable as he finds himself on a massage table. The day ends with dinner at a nearby bistro, but Jenny Harmer complains about the temperature.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Mother and daughter Lesley and Emily Gray play host at the Park Farm guest house in Gateshead, but while the evening's entertainment featuring a ride on a two-wheeled personal transporter goes down well among the guests, tensions simmer when the dinner conversation turns to a delicate issue.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contestants meet one last time to learn how much they have been paid by their fellow hoteliers before discovering who has won the week's competition. Old tensions resurface as the results are announced, and there are heated exchanges around the table.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.desc: First-time buyer Nicki Burridge has a deposit ready for her first house, but cannot decide whether to buy in her home town of St Peter Port in Guernsey, or in the Vendee region of western France, where she hopes to eventually live. Luke Doonan and Laura Hamilton show her some homes to help make up her mind.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.desc: Jonnie Irwin helps a couple with a budget of £175,000 find a retirement home in Shropshire, while Jasmine searches for a suitable property in the Alpujarras region of Spain.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: South London: Blitzkrieg on Shooters Hill.
programme.desc: The archaeologists arrive in the south London district of Shooters Hill to look for evidence of the secret bunkers and anti-tank weapons that formed the capital's line of defence against a possible Nazi invasion during the Second World War. Tony Robinson meets the people who were there, including former members of the Home Guard, and imagines what life might have been like had the Germans landed in Britain.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: Stonton Wyville, Leicestershire: Saxons on the Edge.
programme.desc: Tony and the team are in Stonton Wyville, Leicestershire to investigate evidence of an Anglo-Saxon settlement after locals found pieces of 1,200-year-old pottery in a field.(n)

programme.title: Car SOS
programme.desc: Presenter Tim Shaw and master mechanic Fuzz Townshend head to Brighton to secretly restore a 1984 Audi UR Quattro, which has been under a tarpaulin on a drive for 10 years. Owner Barry has dreamed of working on the vehicle, but health issues have left him sapped of energy and unable to fulfil his wish.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Professor Noel Fitzpatrick tends to a Newfoundland called Billy, who clocks up thousands of miles travelling back and forth from his home in Aberdeen for treatment on its legs. He also attempts to help Barney, a Yorkshire terrier that has a deformity in its neck that is compressing its spinal cord. For owners Linda and Barry, Noel is their last chance, but the operation involves high-risk surgery with no guarantee of success.(n)

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud revisits a couple who took on the task of constructing a sustainable two-storey timber house in the Kent countryside, heated by glass panels. Mimi da Costa managed the project despite a lack of experience, while her husband Andre worked and looked after the children, intending to have it completed in 16 weeks. But as the complex build threatened to drag on for months, it became unclear whether their home would succeed in blending into the landscape and provide them with a greener, healthier lifestyle.(n)

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia
programme.desc: New series. A couple face a challenging build in the beach side suburb of North Bondi, Sydney, with no guarantee of how or when their multi-tiered house will ever be completed.(n)

programme.title: The Secrets of Sleep
programme.desc: This episode follows a woman who has not slept properly for over 10 years after witnessing a traumatic accident, and her attempts to overcome her troublesome disorder.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jon Richardson and Sean Lock face off once again in another unpredictable battle of words and numbers, with help from Kevin Bridges and Rebecca Front. Rachel Riley is on maths-and-letters duty, and Joe Lycett is in Dictionary Corner with Susie Dent.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts another round of light-hearted words-and-numbers fun, with Sean Lock and Katherine Ryan taking on Jon Richardson and David Mitchell. Nick Helm is in Dictionary Corner with Susie Dent, while Rachel Riley does the adding up.(n)

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia
programme.desc: New series. A couple face a challenging build in the beach side suburb of North Bondi, Sydney, with no guarantee of how or when their multi-tiered house will ever be completed.(n)

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud revisits a couple who took on the task of constructing a sustainable two-storey timber house in the Kent countryside, heated by glass panels. Mimi da Costa managed the project despite a lack of experience, while her husband Andre worked and looked after the children, intending to have it completed in 16 weeks. But as the complex build threatened to drag on for months, it became unclear whether their home would succeed in blending into the landscape and provide them with a greener, healthier lifestyle.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Uncut
programme.desc: An extended edition of the irreverent panel show first shown during the Queen's Diamond Jubilee in 2012. Jimmy Carr hosts alongside regular team captains Sean Lock and Jon Richardson, plus guests Sarah Millican, Miles Jupp, Chris Kamara and Jennie Bond.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.desc: First-time buyer Nicki Burridge has a deposit ready for her first house, but cannot decide whether to buy in her home town of St Peter Port in Guernsey, or in the Vendee region of western France, where she hopes to eventually live. Luke Doonan and Laura Hamilton show her some homes to help make up her mind.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Professor Noel Fitzpatrick tends to a Newfoundland called Billy, who clocks up thousands of miles travelling back and forth from his home in Aberdeen for treatment on its legs. He also attempts to help Barney, a Yorkshire terrier that has a deformity in its neck that is compressing its spinal cord. For owners Linda and Barry, Noel is their last chance, but the operation involves high-risk surgery with no guarantee of success.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: David Lewis and Giles Beaton kick off the competition at Langland Road in Swansea, where they hope to impress their guests with an ultra-modern approach. Unfortunately, not all the guests can figure out what the hi-tech offerings are. To make matters worse, traditionalists Gordon and Sandra McCallum are more concerned by cobwebs and dust.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Ruth and Margaret Dugdall welcome their rivals to Castle Lodge Hotel in Felixstowe, Suffolk. Ed Prophet plays a series of tricks on Gordon McCallum in the hope of making him smile, but previous hosts David Lewis and Giles Beaton are unimpressed when the prankster takes on the role of waiter.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Gordon and Sandra McCallum host at Bryn Woodlands House in Colwyn Bay, Conwy, where they take the group harness racing. Ed Prophet worries about getting manure on his face, and later receives a shock. Margaret and Ruth Dugdall think the B&B's decor is poor, and Giles Beaton has a problem with a bottle of ketchup.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Edward Prophet and fiancee Rachel Pickup play host at the Tollemache Arms in Cheshire as the week's competition enters the final round. The couple pull out all the stops to charm their guests, but their efforts are undermined by a shambolic breakfast service.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: As the contestants prepare to discover which of their establishments has won the competition, the owners of Langland Road are shocked by a peculiar payment, and begin to suspect something is amiss. The Castle Lodge hoteliers are dismayed when criticism is directed towards their new wallpaper, and the proprietors of Bryn Woodland House struggle to face up to their shortcomings.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.desc: Property experts Jonnie Irwin and Jasmine Harman help a couple who are currently renting because they have sold their home. While Jeanette is quite certain she would like to settle in Cornwall, Bob has got itchy feet and wants to move to southern Spain.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.desc: Jonnie Irwin and Jasmine Harman help a married couple decide where to spend their retirement. Gail wants to return to her roots and move to the west coast of Scotland, but Clive is craving some sun and likes the look of southern Spain.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: Hunstrete, Somerset: Keeping Up with the Georgians.
programme.desc: Tony Robinson and the team descend on a field outside Bath to search for the remains of the Georgian house built 200 years previously by local MP Francis Popham. A set of stone arches is all that remains of the property, but two oil paintings suggest it was once one of the grandest homes in Britain - although the results of the dig tell a very different story.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: Coberley, Gloucestershire: Mysteries of the Mosaic.
programme.desc: Tony Robinson and the team head to a Cotswolds field, where they suspect the great and the good of Roman Britain once built their homes. However, an extensive dig reveals that the site was once a hub of worship for Bacchus, the pagan god of wine and entertainment, and its destruction was a result of iconoclasm practised by early Roman Christians.(n)

programme.title: Car SOS
programme.desc: Presenter Tim Shaw and master mechanic Fuzz Townshend fix up a historic racing car, an Austin Healey Sprite, which has been kept in a garage since 1968. The challenge is to restore the car so that Sir Stirling Moss, who raced in the vehicle at Sebring in the USA in 1962, can get back behind the wheel.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: A couple who have spent their lives saving stray animals bring in a three-legged cat called Jersey, who has recently become lame in her single back leg. The vet must decide whether the first-ever hip replacement on a three-legged cat is viable. Plus, a Great Dane that is two metres long is given a custom-designed spinal implant, and a Dogue de Bordeaux gets help with elbow dysplasia.(n)

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud revisits a prefabricated-home project in west Cumbria to find out whether Alan and Judith Dawson are happy with the finished product. The couple employed a method of building that allowed them to assemble the property in just 15 days on a budget of £300,000, but with so much attention given to the speed of construction, there was little time to think how the house might be to live in.(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: New series. Period drama telling the story of a Second World War nurse who is mysteriously transported back to 1743 Scotland as she travels back from the battlefields with her husband. In the opening episode, Claire Randall finds herself at the mercy of a British soldier before being kidnapped by a group of Highlanders whose ranks include an injured man named Jamie, Starring Caitriona Balfe, Gary Lewis and Tobias Menzies.(n)

programme.title: 999: What's Your Emergency
programme.desc: This one-off edition of the programme looks at the challenges facing Cheshire's police custody teams, with around 20,000 people passing through their cells every year. Homeless ex-serviceman and repeat offender Michael has been arrested following a complaint about his behaviour in a cinema, but he is just happy to have a roof over his head for the night, while DC Ben Hilton is called out to deal with a case of a woman who has been arrested after stabbing her partner in the leg with a kitchen knife.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A busy night shift sees a series of men admitted with various problems. Father-of-six Stacey is experiencing breathing difficulties, but his demanding attitude appears to mask a vulnerability. Twenty-year-old Sam is brought in after being attacked outside a nightclub and has possible injuries to the neck and spine. He is nervous because his father died at the hospital and, with a broken nose, is worried he may have lost his looks. Henry has an electrician's exam the following morning but has been hiccuping for three days. Registrar Faheem is determined to diagnose the problem and get him well in time.(n)

programme.title: Lockdown

programme.desc: British-born actress Jane Seymour knows there is Jewish ancestry on her father's side of the family, but beyond that she knows very little, other than her own suspicions that they suffered in the Holocaust. programme.title: Live 2017 FIFA Confederations Cup
programme.desc: Portugal v Chile (Kick-off 7.00pm). Coverage of the opening semi-final from Kazan Arena in Russia. Both of these teams remain unbeaten in the tournament so far, with Portugal having topped Group A with a record of two wins and one draw, while one victory and two stalemates was enough for Chile to finish second in Group B behind Germany. Arsenal star Alexis Sanchez recently became the all-time leading scorer for Chile when he notched the opening goal in a 1-1 with the Germans on matchday two, and will be looking to create more headlines in this encounter and lead the South Americans to the final. Presented by Peter Collins, with commentary by George Hamilton and Ronnie Whelan, and analysis from Dietmar Hamann and Richie Sadlier. Subsequent programmes are subject to change.(n)

programme.title: Lethal Weapon

programme.desc: Nick Knowles and the team travel to a village in Conwy, north Wales, to help a widower finish building his home. programme.title: Embarrassing Fat Bodies
programme.desc: The doctors reveal how being overweight can affect toilet habits. Dawn Harper helps a type 2 diabetic suffering from diarrhoea, Christian Jessen refers a man with high blood pressure for pioneering treatment to reduce his waistline and improve his mortifying toilet malfunctions, and Pixie McKenna meets a woman in her forties who has been forced to install a portable loo in her bedroom. Plus, overweight truckers have their stool samples tested for other digestive disorders caused by overeating, such as heartburn, constipation and gallstones.(n)

Richard then visits the Hotel Byblos in St Tropez, where Mick Jagger and Bianca De Macias tied the knot in 1971, before paying a visit to Belles Rivers.(n)

At the Fontainebleau, he meets a man with eye-opening stories about Frank Sinatra's regular visits and gets a shock when he discovers how much it costs to hire a booth in the night club. Richard also gatecrashes swimwear fashion week at the Raleigh Hotel, where he speaks to the event manager about the many celebrity parties he has organised.(n)

programme.title: Urban Secrets

Among his destinations are a 1930s banking building that has remained unaltered since closing in 2007, a well-appointed set of toilets and a recording studio hidden in a bar. He also discovers which former dictator once spent Christmas in the city.(n)

programme.title: Urban Secrets

programme.title: Without a Trace
programme.desc: The team searches for a retired US army officer, but discovers evidence that he may have covered up a fatal incident during his service in Vietnam - which could implicate an influential Congressman. Anthony LaPaglia, Poppy Montgomery and Marianne Jean-Baptiste star.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a schoolgirl whose body was found wrapped in a shower curtain. The evidence points to a classmate with a grudge, who admits his guilt - but the suspect's younger sister also confesses, throwing the case into disarray. Drama, starring Marg Helgenberger and Gary Dourdan.(n)

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Eddie and Jamie become heavily involved in a complicated adoption case between the birth and adoptive parents, and call upon Erin to help them settle the dispute without going to court. Meanwhile, Frank looks into reports of NYPD cadets cheating on their psychological exams. Police drama, starring Tom Selleck, Vanessa Ray and Will Estes.(n)

programme.title: The British
programme.desc: A history of the British Isles from ancient times to the present day, featuring re-enactments of major events and historic turning points. The series begins in 58 AD and reveals how the arrival of a 10,000-strong Roman army changed England, Scotland, Wales and Ireland for ever. The programme also explores the achievements of early Britons, including the construction of Stonehenge, and explores social structures that held sway before the invasion.(n)

programme.title: The West Wing

programme.title: Richard E Grant's Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: In this edition the actor explores the luxury hotels of Hong Kong. Home to more skyscrapers than any other city, he first checks in to the Mandarin in the financial district, before experiencing the Four Seasons, the only hotel with two Michelin three-star resturants, as well as the timeless Peninsula in Kowloon, which even provides a Rolls-Royce airport taxi service. He ends his stay at the Ritz-Carlton, home to the world's highest swimming pool.(n)

programme.title: Richard E Grant's Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: The actor explores Berlin, visiting the arty Propeller Island City Lodge - a hotel where guests can fulfil their fantasies by sleeping in lion cages, coffins or rotating beds. At the Schlosshotel in affluent Grunewald, cabaret dancer Romy Haag talks to Richard about her affair with David Bowie, who stayed at the hotel while living in the German capital in the 1970s.(n)

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming explores Newcastle, discovering strange sounds by the river and finding out how traditional culture is being reinterpreted in the Byker district. He goes behind the scenes at Newcastle United with local football hero Peter Beardsley, learns about the history of adult comic Viz from former editor Simon Donald and accompanies comedienne Sarah Millican to her favourite part of the city.(n)

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming heads across the Irish Sea to Dublin, where he succumbs to the city's famous charm and meets some of its most fascinating characters. On a journey that takes in an 18th-century pleasure house and a burlesque life-painting class, Alan also stops off in Temple Bar for a pint with singer Sharon Corr, unlocks a mystery in Ireland's oldest library and uncovers a stylish secret that lurks behind the steel shutters of an old lock-up.(n)

programme.title: The British
programme.desc: How the Norman Conquest in 1066 transformed Britain, as William the Conqueror sought to assert his power over the whole of England by dismantling the Anglo-Saxon aristocracy and crushing regional diversity. The programme explores the human cost of his campaign and the lasting legacy of the social structures established by the Normans, and explains how a spirit of resistance began to foment among the population. Dramatic reconstructions also reveal how the longbow was instrumental in Henry V's famous victory at the battle of Agincourt in 1415. With contributions by Tim Roth, Jeremy Irons, Micky Flanagan and Tracey Emin.(n)

programme.title: The West Wing
programme.desc: Part one of two. programme.title: The West Wing
programme.desc: Part two of two. Preparations for the Presidential inauguration continue as Charlie hunts desperately for a suitable Bible and the White House edges closer toward military action. programme.title: Without a Trace

programme.desc: A woman more interested in one-night stands than true love is forced to reassess her priorities after meeting the man of her dreams. However, when she hears he is getting married, she sets out on a hectic road trip across America to stop the wedding. Romantic comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Christina Applegate, Selma Blair and Thomas Jane.(n)

programme.title: Road Trip
programme.desc: Four students hit the road, heading off on a foolhardy mission to retrieve an embarrassing video mistakenly sent to an unsuspecting girlfriend - but it is not long before things go wrong and they end up having several nasty scrapes. Comedy, starring Tom Green as the tale's narrator, with Breckin Meyer, Seann William Scott, Amy Smart, Paulo Costanzo and DJ Qualls.(n)

programme.title: The House Bunny
programme.desc: A Playboy bunny is ejected from Hugh Hefner's mansion for being considered over-the-hill on her 27th birthday, and has to find a new home and a fresh role in life. She becomes the unlikely house mother for a dowdy college sorority, and sets about giving its inmates a pin-up style makeover and turning their social lives around. Comedy, starring Anna Faris, Colin Hanks, Emma Stone and Kat Dennings.(n)

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: Years after being humiliated as a student, rogue CIA agent Robbie Wheirdicht turns to old classmate Calvin Joyner for help when he's targeted by his own organisation. Action comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Kevin Hart and Amy Ryan.(n)

programme.title: Bad Neighbours 2
programme.desc: A couple seek the aid of a former rival in fighting back against the raucous college sorority that moves in next door to them. Comedy, starring Seth Rogen and Zac Efron.(n)

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
programme.desc: A female journalist sets out to demonstrate how women manage to put off prospective partners, and spies the perfect man on whom to test her theories. However, the experiment takes an unexpected turn thanks to her guinea pig, who has a hidden agenda of his own. Romantic comedy, starring Kate Hudson, Matthew McConaughey, Adam Goldberg and Michael Michele.(n)

programme.title: Entourage
programme.desc: Movie star Vincent Chase gets the chance of a lifetime when his former agent, now a studio executive, offers him the opportunity to direct and star in his latest picture. However, the project proves a troubled one, while his three best friends seek to exploit the situation to their own advantage. Comedy based on the TV series, starring Adrian Grenier, Kevin Connolly, Kevin Dillon and Jerry Ferrara.(n)

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: Years after being humiliated as a student, rogue CIA agent Robbie Wheirdicht turns to old classmate Calvin Joyner for help when he's targeted by his own organisation. Action comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Kevin Hart and Amy Ryan.(n)

programme.title: Bad Neighbours 2
programme.desc: A couple seek the aid of a former rival in fighting back against the raucous college sorority that moves in next door to them. Comedy, starring Seth Rogen and Zac Efron.(n)

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: Dimwitted Rhode Island limousine driver Lloyd Christmas and his equally vacuous friend Harry Dunne embark on a disaster-fraught cross-country trip to Aspen, where they hope to reunite a briefcase with its female owner. However, the pair are unaware the case contains a $1million ransom they would have been better leaving well alone. Farrelly brothers comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Jeff Daniels, Lauren Holly, Teri Garr and Mike Starr.(n)

programme.title: Jackass Number Two
programme.desc: Another batch of outrageous stunts is lined up by the death-defying friends, who get chased by bulls, used as human shark bait, have leeches attached to their eyes and ride a giant rocket. Comedy sequel, starring Johnny Knoxville, Bam Margera, Steve-O, Chris Pontius and Ryan Dunn.(n)

programme.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
programme.desc: A reckless sports writer and his lawyer hit the highways in search of the American Dream, heading for the Nevada gambling capital in a convertible stocked with alcohol and drugs. Comedy, adapted by Terry Gilliam from Hunter S Thompson's book, starring Johnny Depp, Benicio Del Toro, Ellen Barkin, Christina Ricci and Tobey Maguire.(n)

programme.title: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword - Behind the Scenes
programme.desc: Alex Zane visits the set of Guy Ritchie and Jude Law's epic action adventure to see what it takes to bring King Arthur to life.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Town
programme.desc: A bad-tempered dentist has a near-death experience and finds himself able to see ghosts. He is irritated to find that all the spirits need him to sort out their unresolved problems from when they were alive, particularly a man who wants the grouchy dentist to stop his widow from remarrying. Comedy, starring Ricky Gervais, Greg Kinnear and Tea Leoni.(n)

programme.title: Dirty 30
programme.desc: Four friends stuck in a rut decide to celebrate one of their birthdays in style, but it isn't long before things spiral out of control. Comedy, starring Grace Helbig, Mamrie Hart and Hannah Hart.(n)

programme.title: Dope
programme.desc: A geeky teenager in an inner-city neighbourhood harbours dreams of going to Harvard. He and his friends think their social standing at school is set to improve when they get an invitation to an underground party, but the night leaves them mixed up in crime and drugs and forced to grow up fast. Crime comedy, starring Shameik Moore and Tony Revolori.(n)

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
programme.desc: A lowly fish-tank cleaner working at a gigolo's luxurious house has his eyes opened to a completely new way of life - but an accident with his employer's prized pets puts him into a tricky situation. Desperate to raise a quick buck, he is soon entertaining a series of increasingly sex-crazed women. Comedy, starring Rob Schneider, William Forsythe, Eddie Griffin, Oded Fehr and Gail O'Grady.(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: When a series of supernatural disturbances occur in New York city, a quartet of investigators and their dim assistant investigate. Reboot of the 1980s comedy franchise, starring Kristen Wiig, Melissa McCarthy, Kate McKinnon, Leslie Jones and Chris Hemsworth.(n)

programme.title: Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
programme.desc: A singer is transformed from naive country boy to the greatest rock 'n' roll legend of all time - with the traditional stand-bys of sex, drugs, failed marriages, falls from grace, spectacular comebacks and the love of a good woman along the way. Comedy spoof of music biopics, starring John C Reilly, Jenna Fischer and Raymond J Barry, and featuring appearances from Jack Black and Jack White.(n)

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: Family man Rusty Griswold spent his childhood family holidays stumbling from one disaster to another with his hapless father. He is determined that his own road trip with his wife and kids will go better - but soon finds the apple has not fallen far from the tree. Sequel to the 1980s comedy series, starring Ed Helms and Christina Applegate, with Chevy Chase and Beverly D'Angelo reprising their roles.(n)

programme.title: Get a Job
programme.desc: Two college graduates faced with the prospect of deciding what to do with their lives find themselves faced with a more immediate crisis - getting and keeping a job. Their search for employment takes them through a succession of strange experiences and even stranger workplaces. Comedy, starring Miles Teller, Anna Kendrick, Bryan Cranston and Alison Brie.(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: When a series of supernatural disturbances occur in New York city, a quartet of investigators and their dim assistant investigate. Reboot of the 1980s comedy franchise, starring Kristen Wiig, Melissa McCarthy, Kate McKinnon, Leslie Jones and Chris Hemsworth.(n)

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
programme.desc: A lowly fish-tank cleaner working at a gigolo's luxurious house has his eyes opened to a completely new way of life - but an accident with his employer's prized pets puts him into a tricky situation. Desperate to raise a quick buck, he is soon entertaining a series of increasingly sex-crazed women. Comedy, starring Rob Schneider, William Forsythe, Eddie Griffin, Oded Fehr and Gail O'Grady.(n)

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: European Gigolo
programme.desc: A low-rent lover-for-hire tries to raise the money needed for legal fees when his old friend and former manager lands himself in trouble with the authorities in Amsterdam. Unfortunately, a workers' union of gigolos is less than happy about his arrival in Europe. Comedy sequel, starring Rob Schneider, Eddie Griffin, Jeroen Krabbe and Oded Fehr.(n)

programme.title: A Goofy Movie
programme.desc: The Disney cartoon dog takes his son on an old-fashioned fishing trip in an attempt to bond with the lad. However, young Max has boasted to his pals that he is going to a pop concert in Los Angeles, and has a few ideas on how to trick his dopey dad. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Bill Farmer, Jason Marsden and Wallace Shawn.(n)

programme.title: The Fox and the Hound 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the Disney animation, in which Copper the dog joins a country music band of strays. However, his taste of fame leads him to neglect old friend Tod the fox. With the voices of Patrick Swayze, Reba McEntire, Harrison Fahn and Jonah Bobo.(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In a world where the asteroid impact that wiped out the dinosaurs never happened, humans have evolved as a primitive species while the giant lizards remain the dominant life form on Earth. A young apatosaurus becomes separated from his family, but finds a friend in a feral human boy as he makes the dangerous journey home. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Raymond Ochoa and Jack Bright.(n)

programme.title: Tangled
programme.desc: A baby princess's hair has mystical powers, so an evil witch kidnaps her and locks her in a tower, hoping to use the magic to fend off old age. When the princess is a teenager with 70-foot long tresses, she escapes with the aid of a bandit and goes in search of her home, but the witch is not going to let her go without a fight. Disney animated comedy based on the Rapunzel story, with the voices of Mandy Moore and Zachary Levi.(n)

programme.title: Shipwrecked
programme.desc: A youngster joins a sailing ship to raise money to save his parents' farm, but soon finds himself mixed up in adventure after being thrown overboard and washed up on an island inhabited by a gang of pirates. Disney adventure, starring Gabriel Byrne, Stian Smestad and Louisa Haigh.(n)

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: A boy is raised by animals in the jungles of India, but his carefree life is threatened by the return of a fierce tiger with a grudge against humans. The youngster faces a difficult choice between remaining with his friends or returning to his own people. Live action remake of Disney's animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, starring Neel Sethi, with the voices of Bill Murray, Ben Kingsley and Idris Elba.(n)

programme.title: Pete's Dragon
programme.desc: A young boy orphaned by a car crash and left alone in a forest befriends a giant, fire-breathing dragon. Fantasy adventure, starring Bryce Dallas Howard, Robert Redford and Oakes Fegley.(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In a world where the asteroid impact that wiped out the dinosaurs never happened, humans have evolved as a primitive species while the giant lizards remain the dominant life form on Earth. A young apatosaurus becomes separated from his family, but finds a friend in a feral human boy as he makes the dangerous journey home. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Raymond Ochoa and Jack Bright.(n)

Disney animated comedy based on the Rapunzel story, with the voices of Mandy Moore and Zachary Levi.(n)

The youngster faces a difficult choice between remaining with his friends or returning to his own people. Live action remake of Disney's animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, starring Neel Sethi, with the voices of Bill Murray, Ben Kingsley and Idris Elba.(n)

programme.title: Pete's Dragon
programme.desc: A young boy orphaned by a car crash and left alone in a forest befriends a giant, fire-breathing dragon. Fantasy adventure, starring Bryce Dallas Howard, Robert Redford and Oakes Fegley.(n)

programme.title: Operation Dumbo Drop
programme.desc: Five Green Berets stationed in Vietnam grudgingly undertake a bizarre mission - to help their native hosts by transporting a fully-grown elephant through 200 miles of rough jungle terrain. They soon hit upon a novel way of delivering the beast, deciding to load it into a plane, and then parachute it to its destination. Comedy, starring Danny Glover, Ray Liotta, Denis Leary and Doug E Doug.(n)

programme.title: The Shaggy DA
programme.desc: A boy who once turned into a dog grows up to become a principled lawyer, who runs for district attorney. However, as he campaigns against the crooked current DA, he finds himself once again undergoing a canine transformation and must find out the cause while keeping his condition a secret. Sequel to Disney comedy The Shaggy Dog, starring Dean Jones and Suzanne Pleshette.(n)

programme.title: The Gnome-Mobile
programme.desc: An eccentric millionaire, along with his niece and nephew, finds two gnomes whose homes have been destroyed. They decide to help them find the rest of the tribe, but the family's friends think the tiny creatures are a figment of their imagination. Children's fantasy, starring Walter Brennan, Matthew Garber and Karen Dotrice.(n)

programme.title: Pocahontas II: Journey to a New World
programme.desc: The Native American princess travels to England on a diplomatic quest to broker peace between the two nations - but faces fierce opposition from the devious Governor Ratcliffe. Disney animated adventure sequel, featuring the voices of Irene Bedard, Jim Cummings, Donal Gibson and Judy Kuhn.(n)

programme.title: Aladdin and the King of Thieves
programme.desc: The Arabian adventurer prepares to marry his beloved Jasmine, but gets distracted by a gang of robbers who have stolen a powerful magical artefact, as well as the news that his long-lost father is still alive. Animated adventure sequel, with the voice of Robin Williams, Scott Weinger, Linda Larkin and John Rhys-Davies.(n)

programme.title: Eight Below
programme.desc: An Antarctic scientific expedition has to be aborted when a blizzard hits, forcing their guide to leave behind his team of huskies in the frozen wilderness. He is determined to return and rescue the animals, but in the meantime, the dogs have to rely on pack instinct alone to ensure their survival in the hostile climate. Disney adventure, starring Paul Walker, Bruce Greenwood and Jason Biggs.(n)

programme.title: The Love Bug
programme.desc: Herbie, an irrepressible Beetle car with a mind of its own, takes a shine to a struggling racing driver and leads him to victory on the track. However, his success attracts the attention of an unscrupulous rival competitor, who will go to any lengths to win the most important race of all. Disney comedy, starring Dean Jones, Michele Lee, Buddy Hackett and David Tomlinson.(n)

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: A street urchin is caught up in a scheming grand vizier's plot to get his clutches on a magical lamp. Retrieving the object from a wondrous cave, he releases a powerful genie trapped inside, whose ability to grant wishes helps the young hero thwart the villain's plans and woo a princess. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Robin Williams, Scott Weinger and Linda Larkin.(n)

programme.title: Underdog
programme.desc: A mad scientist kidnaps a beagle to use as a guinea pig in his deranged experiments. But an accidental injection leaves the mutt with awe-inspiring superpowers, which he uses to foil the deranged inventor's plans to take over a city. Comedy adventure, starring Peter Dinklage and James Belushi, and featuring the voices of Jason Lee and Amy Adams.(n)

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Inside 11-year-old Riley's head lives a team of five that controls her emotions. Led by the eternally upbeat Joy, they have always ensured she lived a happy life - but when Riley's parents move to a new city, she is plunged into depression and the emotions face a crisis that threatens their entire world. Pixar animated fantasy, with the voices of Amy Poehler and Phyllis Smith.(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A bookish woman agrees to take her father's place as prisoner of a fearsome monster living in a castle deep in the forest. She gradually grows to see a gentler, more human side to her hideous host, and comes to realise she may be able to break the curse that turned him into a beast in the first place. Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Paige O'Hara and Robby Benson.(n)

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: A street urchin is caught up in a scheming grand vizier's plot to get his clutches on a magical lamp. Retrieving the object from a wondrous cave, he releases a powerful genie trapped inside, whose ability to grant wishes helps the young hero thwart the villain's plans and woo a princess. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Robin Williams, Scott Weinger and Linda Larkin.(n)
